Article Title: Isro launches US comsat BlueBird Block-2; heaviest payload launched by LVM3
Article Text:
(Credit: Isro)

ISRO Launches Heaviest-Ever Satellite BlueBird Block-2 Onboard LVM3 Rocket

SRIHARIKOTA: India’s heavy-lift rocket LVM3 on Wednesday successfully placed the US communications satellite- BlueBird Block-2 - into low Earth orbit, in an early morning launch mission. At 6100kg, it was the heaviest payload lifted by the rocket which completed its sixth operational flight and third dedicated commercial mission. Isro chairman V Narayanan said LVM3 rocket achieved an orbit of 518.5km against the planned 520km orbit."This is the heaviest satellite to be launched by an Indian launcher in Indian soil. This is also the first back to back LVM3 launch missions within a period of 52days. With this, Isro has placed 434 satellites for 34 countries."The 43.5m tall and 640tonne rocket lifted off from the Second Launch Pad at the Satish Dhawan Space Centre, Sriharikota. About 16 minutes after liftoff, BlueBird Block-2 was injected into a circular orbit at an altitude of around 520km with an inclination of 53degrees.The mission, designated LVM3-M6, was undertaken as part of a commercial agreement between NewSpace India Limited (NSIL), the commercial arm of Isro, and US-based AST & Science LLC.BlueBird Block-2 is part of a global low Earth orbit constellation aimed at enabling direct-to-mobile satellite connectivity.According to mission details, the satellite features a 223 square metre phased-array antenna, making it the largest commercial communications satellite deployed in low Earth orbit. The constellation is designed to support 4G and 5G voice and video calls, video streaming, text messaging and data services directly on standard mobile phones, without the need for specialised ground equipment.
Article Summary: At 6100kg, it was the heaviest payload lifted by the rocket. Isro chairman v narayanan said lvm3 rocket achieved an orbit of 518.5km against the planned 520km orbit. Bluebird block-2 is part of a global low earth orbit constellation aimed at enabling direct-to-mobile satellite connectivity.

Article Title: ‘Indian passport no longer adds value to my life’: Tech educator frustrated over visa hurdles
Article Text:
India’s Silent Exodus: Over Two Lakh Indian Citizens Quit Passports Yearly Amid Changing Aspirations





Kunal Kushwaha, an Indian-origin tech educator and developer advocate, shared a personal account of the limits he says come with holding an Indian passport while working globally. In a viral post on X, Kushwaha described how visa rules and paperwork often disrupt his travel plansAfter a recent trip to Berlin, Kushwaha said he was unable to travel to Ireland to surprise his best friend on his birthday because there was not enough time to apply for another visa. What should have been a simple decision, booking a flight, instead turned into hours spent navigating visa websites. The episode, he wrote, showed how routine travel can become unnecessarily complicated.In his post, Kushwaha described standing in long airport queues while other travellers passed through quickly. He said he often carries folders of documents he has already submitted many times. Schengen visa applications, he added, feel like a full-time job. They require bank statements, cover letters and detailed explanations for ordinary trips.“I’m not angry. I’m tired,” he wrote. Kushwaha stressed that his frustration is practical rather than emotional.He said national pride does not reduce the mental effort needed to deal with constant paperwork.The post also pointed to wider questions about passport strength. India ranks low on global mobility indexes and offers visa-free access to relatively few destinations. Kushwaha argued that these rankings translate into real constraints for professionals who travel frequently for work, conferences and collaboration.Many replies to his post shared similar experiences. Users posted stories of delayed appointments, short visa validity periods and uncertainty even for repeat travellers with established international careers.Kushwaha also touched on issues beyond travel. He said investments made in India had lost value over time because of the rupee’s decline. He also mentioned air pollution and outdated banking and KYC processes as factors that add to everyday friction.
Article Summary: Kunal kushwaha, an indian-origin tech educator and developer advocate, shared a personal account of the limits he says come with holding an indian passport. In a viral post on x, he described how visa rules and paperwork often disrupt his travel plans. The post also pointed to wider questions about passport strength.

Article Title: BlueBird Block-2 mission: Isro releases rare onboard camera footage from liftoff to satellite separation — Watch
Article Text:
ANI Photo

Bluebird Lift-Off Shows ISRO Commercial Power As Nambi Narayanan Calls LVM-3 Game Changer Move

The Indian Space Research Organisation ( Isro ) on Wednesday released rare onboard camera footage from its heaviest rocket, LVM3-M6, offering a rocket’s-eye view of the BlueBird Block-2 mission from liftoff to satellite separation.The footage shared by Isro on X features visuals captured by cameras onboard and documents each major phase of the ascent. The footage shows the rocket lifting off from the second launch pad at the Satish Dhawan Space Centre in Sriharikota, Andhra Pradesh, followed by the separation of the twin S200 solid strap-on boosters. It then captures the separation of the L110 liquid core stage and the jettisoning of the payload fairing, before concluding with the successful separation of the BlueBird Block-2 satellite into Low Earth Orbit.The visuals were recorded during Isro’s successful commercial launch of the next-generation US communication satellite for AST SpaceMobile earlier in the day. The 6,100 kg satellite was placed into its intended orbit at an altitude of about 520 km, approximately 15 minutes after launch.The 43.5-metre-tall LVM3 lifted off at 8.55 am after the completion of a 24-hour countdown. Powered by two S200 solid boosters, a liquid core stage and a cryogenic upper stage, the rocket performed all mission events as planned.The space agency said the mission, designated LVM3-M6, marked the sixth operational flight of the LVM3 launch vehicle, nicknamed ‘Bahubali’ for its heavy-lift capability. The Isro chief, Dr V Narayanan, described the mission’s success as a “season’s gift” to the country.BlueBird Block-2 is part of a Low Earth Orbit constellation being developed by US-based AST SpaceMobile. The satellite is designed to enable direct-to-mobile connectivity, providing 4G and 5G voice and video calls, text messaging, streaming and data services directly to standard mobile smartphones.Developed by Isro, the three-stage LVM3 has a lift-off mass of 640 tonnes and a payload capability of 4,200 kg to Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit. In earlier missions, it has successfully launched Chandrayaan-2, Chandrayaan-3 and two OneWeb missions carrying 72 satellites.
Article Summary: Isro released rare onboard camera footage from its heaviest rocket, lvm3-m6, offering a rocket’s-eye view of the bluebird block-2 mission from liftoff to satellite separation. The footage shows the rocket lifting off from the second launch pad at the satish dhawan space centre in sriharikota, andhra pradesh.

Article Title: Isro delivers its heaviest punch as Bahubali puts BlueBird into orbit
Article Text:
Isro delivers its heaviest punch as Bahubali puts BlueBird into orbit

ISRO’s Heaviest Launch Yet: Five Reasons Why BlueBird-2 Marks India’s Big Leap In Global Space Race

SRIHARIKOTA: Baahubali sent BlueBird to the heavens. India’s space ambitions gained new heights and heft. Isro capped 2025 with a flawless heavy-lift statement Wednesday, as its LVM3 rocket — nicknamed Baahubali — hurled the US communications satellite BlueBird Block-2 into low Earth orbit, the heaviest spacecraft ever launched from Indian soil.The lift-off came from the second launch pad at Sriharikota at 8.55 am, delayed by a minute to sidestep space debris. Fifteen minutes later, precision prevailed. The 6,100kg satellite was injected into a near-perfect circular orbit, marking another clean chapter for India’s human-rated launcher.The mission extended LVM3’s unbroken streak to nine consecutive successes — a milestone that sharpens confidence for the Gaganyaan human spaceflight programme and signals India’s arrival as a serious player in the global LEO communications market.Isro chairman V Narayanan called it a standout flight on multiple fronts. The launcher achieved orbital accuracy of less than 1.5km, placing BlueBird at 518.9km against a target of 520km — the best performance by an Indian rocket to date. “With nine consecutive successful LVM3 launches, our confidence in the Gaganyaan mission has significantly increased,” Narayanan said.Beyond mass and accuracy, the launch carried historical weight.It marked Isro’s 434th satellite deployment for 34 countries across 45 years, and the first back-to-back LVM3 mission, executed with a turnaround of just 52 days.Technological upgrades pushed the rocket further. Payload capability rose by more than 150kg after electro-hydraulic actuators were replaced with electro-mechanical systems to control the massive S200 booster motors. “With additional technologies, we have demonstrated that Isro is in a much better position for future missions, including Gaganyaan,” said mission director T Victor Joseph.The flight underscored rising commercial momentum. P Mohan, acting chairman and MD of Isro’s commercial arm NewSpace India Ltd, said interest in the launcher is accelerating. “There is interest for six to 10 LVM3 missions annually, with several global companies seeking up to six launches per year from 2026–27 onwards,” he said.Wednesday’s mission, designated LVM3-M6, was flown under a commercial agreement between NSIL and US-based AST & Science LLC. BlueBird Block-2 forms part of a global LEO constellation designed to deliver direct-to-mobile 4G and 5G connectivity.Shanti Gupta, chief operating officer of AST SpaceMobile, said the company aims to deploy 45 to 60 satellites by the end of 2026 for worldwide coverage and is in talks with space agencies across the globe, including Isro.Industry voices framed the launch as a strategic inflection point. Space Industry Association of India president Subba Rao said India now stands among a select group capable of reliably deploying heavy-class LEO payloads for next-generation telecom networks.“Its significance lies not just in launch success, but in what it signals about India’s industrial readiness, reliability, and ability to support constellations at scale over time,” he said.Indian Space Association director general Lt Gen (retd) AK Bhatt described the mission as a quantum leap. “It exemplifies Isro’s engineering excellence and operational maturity, enabling heavier payloads for global satellite constellations,” he said.“The mission strengthens India’s self-reliance in launch services and positions Isro as a preferred provider for international missions, while accelerating growth across the domestic space ecosystem.”As Baahubali faded into the morning sky, the message lingered on Earth: India is no longer testing the limits of heavy lift — it is defining them.
Article Summary: Isro delivers its heaviest punch as bahubali puts bluebird into orbit. Bluebird block-2 forms part of a global leo constellation designed to deliver direct-to-mobile 4g and 5g connectivity. Indian space association director general lt gen (retd) ak bhatt described the mission as a quantum leap.

Article Title: Ashwini Vaishnaw: Rahul Gandhi's praise for Karnataka jobs affirms Make in India success
Article Text:
File photo: Union minister Ashwini Vasihnaw (Picture credit: PTI)

'Best Time To Invest, Innovate And Make In India': PM Narendra Modi

NEW DELHI: Rahul Gandhi's praise for "transformative" job creation in Karnataka led I&B minister Ashwini Vaishnaw Wednesday to assert that it was an acknowledgement of the success of PM Narendra Modi's 'Make in India' programme.He said on X, "Thanks Rahul Gandhi for acknowledging the success of PM Modi's 'Make in India' programme. As you have noted, we are becoming a producer economy as we implement our PM's vision."In a recent social media post, the LoP in Lok Sabha had cited a news report to highlight the hiring of 30,000 staff in 8-9 months, the fastest factor ramp-up seen in India so far, by Foxconn in the Congress-ruled Karnataka.Rahul had said, "It is transformative job creation. What makes it even more powerful is that the unit is largely women-led, with around 80% women, most aged 19-24, and for many, this is their first job. Karnataka is setting an example by creating an ecosystem where manufacturing can grow at this scale and speed. This is India we must build: jobs with dignity, and opportunities for all."Officials pointed out that it was during Covid that the Modi government, tapping into the widespread recognition to diversify supply chains, nudged Apple's vendors, including Foxconn, to shift significant parts of their manufacturing operations from China. The nudge often resembled a covert operation as Beijing sought to block reshoring. At the time, it was a BJP government in Karnataka and Centre's production linked incentives played a major role as it provided sops to mobile manufacturers. The government followed it up with incentives for electronic components.Since then Foxconn has bolstered its operations in the country with a large presence in Tamil Nadu and is also looking at facilities in UP.
Article Summary: Rahul gandhi's praise for "transformative" job creation in karnataka led i&b minister ashwini vaishnaw wednesday to assert that it was an acknowledgement of the success of pm narendra modi's 'make in india' programme.

Article Title: Significant stride in Indian space sector: PM Modi on heaviest satellite launch by Isro's Bahubali
Article Text:
Representative image

ISRO’s Heaviest Launch Yet: Five Reasons Why BlueBird-2 Marks India’s Big Leap In Global Space Race

NEW DELHI: PM Narendra Modi on Wednesday congratulated Isro after its ‘Bahubali’ rocket LVM-M6 successfully placed US’s new-generation BlueBird Block-2 communication satellite, weighing 6,100 kg, into orbit.It was the heaviest payload to be placed into the low earth orbit (LEO) in LVM3’s launch history -- the previous heaviest was the LVM3-M5 communication satellite 03, weighing about 4,400 kg, that was placed into the geosynchronous transfer orbit (GTO) on November 2.“A significant stride in India’s space sector. The successful LVM3-M6 launch, placing the heaviest satellite ever launched from Indian soil, the spacecraft of USA, BlueBird Block-2, into its intended orbit, marks a proud milestone in India's space journey," PM Modi said in a post on X.The mission marks the 6th operational flight of the LVM3 launch vehicle. It also represents a significant leap in telecommunications technology, as the US payload is designed to provide high-speed 4G and 5G connectivity directly to smartphones.BlueBird Block-2 is the second important US satellite launch from India this year after the Indo-US joint mission’s NISAR, the world’s costliest (around $1.5 billion) and most advanced Earth-imaging satellite.As of late Dec 2025, Isro has launched at least 234 satellites for the US.Since 2015, when India launched the first commercial US satellites on board PSLV-C30, American satellites make up the largest portion of the total 434 foreign satellites launched by Isro, contributing significantly to the nearly $143 million in foreign exchange revenue generated by these launches.Space minister Jitendra Singh also congratulated Isro on the successful launch. "I think it is the moment of glory for the country. It has been possible because of the progress of the last 10 to 12 years (under the PM Narendra Modi-led government).Even though the American satellites were being launched from Sriharikota earlier as well, today's launch has demonstrated to the world that we have the capacity to launch a satellite as heavy as 6,000 kgs," he said.Placing a 6-tonne-class satellite into LEO is significant because payload mass has become a key indicator for constellation efficiency in the direct-to-device and hybrid satellite-terrestrial era. Heavier satellites enable higher payload consolidation, fewer orbital assets, simplified phasing, and lower per-user costs when serving mass-market connectivity.From an operator’s perspective, this reduces both capital intensity and operational complexity. India’s demonstrated ability to support such missions meaningfully alters how global satcom players model constellation architecture, insurance exposure, and launch diversification.Commenting on the broader significance, Subba Rao, president of Space Industry Association India, said: “This mission demonstrates that India is now part of the core commercial LEO deployment landscape. The importance lies not only in launch success, but in what it signals about India’s industrial readiness, reliability, and ability to support constellations at scale over time. That confidence is what global operators ultimately build programmes around. ”Several industrial units from the Indian private industry have contributed significantly to LVM3 rocket success.Ananth Technologies Pvt Ltd (ATL), a long-standing partner of the Indian Space Programme, said, 'It is proud to have contributed to this historic mission". "ATL has been closely associated with the LVM3 programme and has delivered critical flight hardware, avionics systems, electronics, and precision subsystems that play a vital role in mission success," a company statement said.
Article Summary: Pm narendra modi congratulated isro after its ‘bahubali’ rocket lvm-m6 successfully placed us’s new-generation bluebird block-2 communication satellite. The mission marks the 6th operational flight of the lvm3 launch vehicle. It also represents a significant leap in telecommunications technology, as the us payload is designed to provide high-speed 4g and 5g connectivity.

Article Title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon combined net worth in 2025: WWE legacy, business ventures, and financial empire
Article Text:
Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon (Image Source: Getty)

Shane McMahon’s WWE legacy and wealth creation

Business ventures and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon’s role

Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon, who both served as WWE Producer/Director, are worth a combined $650 million, the result of decades spent near one of sports entertainment’s most influential families and a carefully curated soon-to-branch portfolio beyond the ring. Shane, as a key McMahon heir, has had his financial profile associated with WWE's ascendance to a worldwide media conglomerate for decades, while Marissa's career has been largely away from the limelight.Their fortune, collectively, is uneven but complementary at best. The vast bulk of the couple's wealth originates from Shane, who owns most of the couple's cash, investments, and property, as Marissa’s professional income and personal assets serve to augment, not scale, the family nest-egg. Rumors in the financial, as well as the gossip and entertainment worlds, have put their collective net gross at around $205 million by the year 2025, but the numbers are tightly held secret from the outside world and media.Even hooks have different weights, and for Shane McMahon, his financial foundation came from WWE, where he served in various capacities as an executive, on-camera talent, and brand representative.He was in charge when WWE became a publicly traded, globally syndicating corporation, a transition that paid senior insiders in the form of salaries, bonuses and equity-linked pay. Shane also became recognized over the years for the insane, risk-taking, high impact, physical matches that elevated his brand and worth.Overall, Shane's net worth is often assumed to be around $200 million in the year 2025 as an individual. That number includes years of WWE and associated earnings, assets from the McMahon family estate, and WWE-affiliated corporate relationships. Although he was never as high on the control totem pole as his old man, Vince, his standing in the company meant he was around some significant cash decisions in WWE's most successful years.Shane McMahon has built up a portfolio of separate business interests away from the world of WWE, with a particular focus on technology, media, and emerging industries in the United States. He has been chairman and advisor to a number of companies, as part of the indication that he might be looking to diversify beyond wrestling-related income. They have not always been runaway headline-grabbers, but all together they build up his overall financial footprint and his long game for the long haul.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Less dramatic is the financial story of Marissa Mazzola-McMahon. She comes from a film production and corporate public relations background, and her career has been built on cash flows, not large equity windfalls. Her own net worth is frequently thought to be about $5 million. Add in Shane's holdings, and their financial empire still has deep roots in WWE legacy wealth, supported, but increasingly crucial, by business diversification.Also Read: Shane McMahon adds fuel to rumors of Vince McMahon reclaiming WWE ownership
Article Summary: Shane mcmahon and marissa mazzola-mcmahon, who both served as wwe producer/director, are worth a combined $650 million. Shane, as a key mcmahon heir, has had his financial profile associated with wwe's ascendance to a worldwide media conglomerate. Marissa's career has been largely away from the limelight.

Article Title: Philip Rivers car collection: Inside the newest Colts QB’s lavish $200K customized Cadillac and Ford models
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Philip Rivers)

A 2008 Ford F-150 and a Cadillac Escalade SUV fill the garage space of Indianapolis Colts veteran quarterback Philip Rivers

The two most important things in Philip Rivers’ life are family and football preparation

After more than 17 years in the NFL with the San Diego Chargers, Los Angeles Chargers, and Indianapolis Colts, eight-time Pro Bowler and NFL Comeback Player of the Year Philip Rivers has over 63,000 passing yards, 400 touchdowns, and a passer rating of 95.1.At 44, Rivers surprised everyone by coming out of retirement to play for his former team and the late Jim Irsay’s Colts. Now, two games into the 2025 season, he has amassed over 397 passing yards, three touchdowns, and a passer rating of 86.6.Rivers’ drive as a quarterback remains strong on the gridiron. What about his mode of transportation? What about his car collection? Two vehicles reportedly fill his garage: a 2008 Ford F-150 [some reports say F-250] and a Cadillac Escalade SUV. The customized SUV costs about $200,000, while his everyday Ford’s estimated cost is not publicly disclosed. Let’s take a closer look at them.Francisco Cruz of Ford Authority reported in April 2020, that despite earning $215 million as an NFL quarterback, Philip Rivers is driving a 2008 Ford F-150 pickup truck. Rivers drives a heavy-duty truck that is almost 17 years old now. The multi-millionaire star’s primary vehicle boasts a towing capacity over 9,000 pounds and has a 5.4L Triton V8 engine with 300 horsepower and 365 pound-feet of torque.It can easily carry six people. Higher-end model features include powered and heated leather seating, dual-zone automatic climate control, entertainment options such as a CD or DVD system, a large center console, and folding rear seats for cargo flexibility. In September 2017, Kevin Acee of the San Deigo Union-Tribune reported that Rivers’ primary mode of transportation is a 2008 Ford F-250.The second vehicle to catch attention is a Cadillac Escalade SUV. Rivers contacted the makers of high-end vehicles for Hollywood elites like Dr. Dre, Stevie Wonder Jerry Seinfeld , and Barbra Streisand . Reportedly costing close to $200,000, the SUV was customized by Becker Automotive Design in Oxnard, California, in 2017. Amenities include a 40-inch TV, refrigerator, two captain seats with Rivers’ No. 17 on one headrest, satellite TV, wireless internet, a fresh-air ventilation system, a professional quality sound system, and electric leg extensions.Rivers spoke about the SUV with the San Diego Union-Tribune in 2017. “My two biggest things were my family time and my preparation and what I owe this football team,” Rivers said. “I was not going to sacrifice either of them in any big proportion. I can look at all the pluses and minuses and say, ‘Okay, this does it.’This allows me to get home in six to seven hours, which is when I got home the last 11 years, and it allows me to watch all or more of the film I watched before. I don’t want it to be - he’s stuck in a car all day, maybe that’s why he struggled.” The father of ten may be currently using this Cadillac Escalade to prepare for Colts’ matchups.According to Spotrac, Rivers’ career earnings total $244.2 million as of December 2025. He signed a one-year, $1.255 million contract with the Indianapolis Colts for the 2025 season. His estimated net worth in 2025 is reportedly $100 million.Also Read: Kay Adams wants to take away Philip Rivers’ Hall of Fame and give it to Shaun Alexander—for having 14 children
Article Summary: Philip rivers is an eight-time pro bowler and nfl comeback player of the year. He has over 63,000 passing yards, 400 touchdowns, and a passer rating of 95.1. Despite earning $215 million as an nfl quarterback, rivers is driving a 2008 ford f-150 pickup truck. The second vehicle to catch attention is a cadillac escalade suv.

Article Title: What is Lane Hutson’s net worth in 2025? Details on Montreal Canadiens star’s earnings, deals, endorsements
Article Text:
Lane Hutson with Montreal Canadiens (Credit: Getty Images)

How Much Will Lane Hutson Cost the Habs? | Daily Faceoff LIVE

Montreal Canadiens defenseman Lane Hutson’s 2025 net worth explained



Lane Hutson is a defensive player who plays and represents the Montreal Canadiens as an American-Canadian; however, he has swiftly attracted notice in the NHL because of his ability, sight, and assists. Selected 62nd overall in the 2022 NHL Entry Draft, Hutson immediately found his way on the Canadiens roster, with maturity beyond his years. His offensive nature and capability to play on the power play as well as in the normal defense game have made him a key to the future plans of the Montreal team.By 2025, the net worth of Lane Hutson will be based mostly on the hockey earnings. It is the last year of his three-year entry contract with the Canadiens, which has a maximum salary of 950,000 as a cap expenditure in the next 2025-26 season. This contract was small in relation to the experienced NHL players. However, it was the basis of his financial skyrocket as his performance was still astonishing to both the management and the fans.In October 2025, Hutson announced a major eight-year extension to his contract worth up to $70.8 million, beginning in 2026-27. The agreement also has a huge signing bonus of 55 million dollars, which offers the immediate financial security in addition to the confidence of the Canadiens in his value with regard to the long-term.Hutson is playing in the ranks of better-paid defensemen of his age in the NHL, as this contract has an average annual value of $8.85 million.In addition to his contracts, Hutson is likely to have the net worth increased by the possible endorsements and sponsorships, but their numbers are not publicly available. With his increased profile in the league, all these off-ice opportunities will play a key role in his financial portfolio. Upon the expiration of his latest contract extension, Hutson is projected to have made over $73 million in his career; this puts him on the list of the NHL's emerging financial and athletic superstars.Those who are used to news reports and updates of the NHL matches, trade speculations, and news releases are expected to hear a lot of the Hutson name amidst the hockey team as the central figure of the Montreal Canadiens. The year 2025 turns out to be a defining year both in his career and financially, since he is building up on the ice and earning more off the ice.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Toronto Maple Leafs captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Montreal canadiens defenseman lane hutson’s 2025 net worth explained. Hutson is a defensive player who plays and represents the montreal canadiens as an american-canadian. He has swiftly attracted notice in the nhl because of his ability, sight, and assists.

Article Title: Stefon Diggs car collection: Inside the Patriots star’s million-dollar automotive empire
Article Text:
(Image 1 via X and Image 2 via Instagram: Stefon Diggs)

Stefon Diggs’ luxurious car garage is reportedly filled with Mercedes-Benz, Rolls-Royce, Tesla, and Porsche



Mercedes G63 AMG:

Rolls-Royce Wraith:

Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG:

Tesla Cybertruck:

Porsche 911 GT3 RS:

Rolls-Royce Cullinan:

In April 2021, TMZ Sports reported Stefon Diggs’ flashy Mercedes-Benz G-Wagon was found abandoned near train tracks in Miami. Officials said a silver Mercedes-Benz G-Class SUV with Maryland plates was registered to Diggs. Authorities found no sign of the then-Buffalo Bills wide receiver, the driver, or any passengers at the scene.After a brief investigation, they towed the vehicle. Diggs’ representative told TMZ, “[Stefon] was not driving the car. He allowed a friend to use the car while he was gone. Unfortunately, the friend got a flat tire with the car.” Diggs’ spokesperson said the vehicle was not stolen and no wrongdoing was involved.Now, Cardi B ’s partner Stefon Diggs reportedly owns over $1 million in cars: Mercedes G63 AMG, Rolls-Royce Wraith, Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, Tesla Cybertruck, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, and Rolls-Royce Cullinan.The white exterior with red interior SUV reportedly costs $156,700. It features a 4L twin-turbo V8 engine producing 480 horsepower and 627 pound-feet of torque. It reaches 60 mph in 4.5 seconds. The maximum speed is 136 mph, and it has a seven-speed automatic transmission.The silver icon of luxury reportedly costs $370,500. It features a 6.6L V12 engine producing 591 horsepower and 664 pound-feet of torque. Maximum speed is 155 mph. It has an eight-speed shiftable automatic transmission. It goes from 0 to 60 in 4.5 seconds.The silver exterior, red interior sports car reportedly costs $500,000. It features a 6.2L naturally aspirated V8 engine producing 563 horsepower and 479 pound-feet of torque. It goes from 0 to 60 mph in 3.8 seconds and has a seven-speed automatic transmission.Chris Owens of Country 106.5 WYRK [Buffalo Country Radio] reported in February 2024 that then-Buffalo Bills star Stefon Diggs shared Instagram posts with an impressive vehicle in the background. They assumed Diggs was driving a futuristic car. It appeared to be a Tesla Cybertruck, which looked like it came out of a science-fiction movie.Monica Coman of Auto Evolution reported in December 2022 that Diggs treated himself to a Porsche GT3 RS for his 29th birthday on November 29. The sports car had a two-tone light gray and black exterior with red wheel accents. It features a 4L flat-six naturally aspirated engine producing 513 horsepower and 347 pound-feet of torque. It has a seven-speed dual-clutch gearbox. It can hit 62 mph in 3.2 seconds, and the maximum speed is 194 mph.The white luxury car, introduced in 2018, features a 6.75L twin-turbocharged V12 engine with 563 horsepower and 627 pound-feet of torque. The SUV accelerates from 0 to 62 mph in 5.2 seconds and has a top speed of 155 mph.As of December 2025, Stefon Diggs’ total career earnings are $155,871,681, according to Spotrac. He signed a three-year, $63.5 million contract with the New England Patriots in March 2025.Also Read: Stefon Diggs’ partner Cardi B records Patriots WR’s mom Stephanie celebrating as New England enters the 2025 NFL Playoffs
Article Summary: Stefon diggs' mercedes-benz g-wagon was found abandoned near train tracks in miami in april 2021. Authorities found no sign of the then-buffalo bills wide receiver, the driver, or any passengers at the scene. Diggs’ representative said the vehicle was not stolen and no wrongdoing was involved.

Article Title: Brandon Ingram & GloRilla Vs Klay Thompson & Megan Thee Stallion's combined net worth in 2025: Earnings, assets, investments, and more
Article Text:
Klay Thompson & Megan Thee Stallion Vs Brandon Ingram & GloRilla's net worth (Image via Getty Images)

Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion 's combined net worth in 2025: Earnings, assets, investments, and more

Brandon Ingram and GloRilla's combined net worth in 2025: Earnings, assets, investments, and more

NBA players are well-known figures. Prominent male athletes are frequently able to locate some of the most attractive and remarkable women. It makes sense that they would date other well-known individuals like actresses, models, or singers since they are essentially celebrities.In the NBA, it is not only the athletes who are creating waves on the court that attract all the attention but also the alluring ladies standing by as their biggest fans, particularly if that athlete is a member of the NBA, the second-biggest professional sports league in the country. The NBA has seen a lot of head-turning girlfriends this year.According to publications like Celebrity Net Worth and others, Klay Thompson's wealth in 2025 is estimated to be between the lower limit of $70 million and the higher maximum of $140 million. This is mostly because of his lucrative three-year, $50 million NBA contract with the Dallas Mavericks, which begins in 2024.He also has huge endorsement deals with companies like Anta, and his investments are propelling him up the financial ladder. Megan Thee Stallion's estimated net worth in 2025 is $40 million. In addition to her music, the singer has a number of contracts with other companies. She was named the brand ambassador for the well-known cosmetics firm Revlon in 2020.In addition to owning Realtypath, a real estate company, he has invested in Overtime, a sports media start-up, and Sleeper, a fantasy sports website. Article Title: Elon Musk's net worth: The world's richest man becomes the first ever with $600 billion worth amid SpaceX's valuation surge
Article Text:
Source: Forbes

'US Benefited Immensely From Indians', Says Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Warns US Against Scrapping H-1B

Elon Musk becomes the first person to hit a whopping figure of $600 billion in net worth





Elon Musk’s wealth surge driven by SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI





SpaceX





Tesla

xAI

Elon Musk’s rapid rise: From $24 billion to the brink of trillionaire status









Elon Musk has reached a historical financial milestone, as he has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion, as reported in Forbes magazine. This milestone has been achieved during a time when there is newfound interest in his privately owned rocket company, SpaceX, which he believes will make a historical initial start detailing a whopping value of $800 billion with an initial public offering that could potentially take place in 2026.Musk's net worth has not only increased with his involvement with his rocket company, SpaceX, but he has earned a tremendous amount of money with his investment in electric cars with his company, Tesla, where his net worth has increased by a whopping 12% because of his investment in his own artificial intelligence company, xAI.As reported by Forbes, Elon Musk has now broken yet another record by being the first individual to ever reach a net worth of over $600 billion. This achievement has come at a time when his private rocket company, SpaceX, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026. Musk's net worth is also contributed by his stake of 12% in Tesla, an electric vehicle behemoth, and his artificial intelligence company, xAI, both of which keep increasing in value.From groundbreaking innovations in space travel and electric mobility to ambitious AI projects, futuristic ventures, and global business expansions, Musk’s diversified portfolio and relentless pursuit of technological advancement have cemented his status as the world’s richest person.SpaceX has also showcased its role in the increasing wealth of Musk to historic levels. With an estimated 42% stake in the firm, the net worth of Musk is expected to grow by an enormous $168 billion if SpaceX continues to retain its current valuation of $800 billion. Analysts also expect it to reach a valuation of $1.5 trillion when it comes to the public market and possibly become the first trillionaire in the world. The innovative nature of SpaceX in terms of its rocket and satellite launches continues to impress the market while affecting the net worth of its CEO.Tesla stock is still an integral part of Musk’s financial network. His current stake of about 12% in Tesla is valued at $197 billion without taking into consideration the stock options from the 2018 CEO Performance Award that are still winding their way through litigation. Apart from that, Tesla shareholders have just approved what is considered the largest compensation deal of $1 trillion that is pegged on meeting various performance goals, including doubling the current market capitalization eightfold in ten years.Musk’s AI company, xAI, is also a significant contributor to his net worth. In the advanced talk of raising funding worth $15 billion in fresh equity, the firm is placed at a value of $230 billion. Musk owns about 53% of the firm’s stakes under xAI Holdings, meaning he has a net worth of about $60 billion. AI is another major sector into which Musk has ventured.Musk's emergence to $600 billion in a short span of time can be noted. He started with $24.6 billion in March 2020 and broke the $100 billion mark later in the same year, and reached $190 billion in January 2021. He broke many records in the last five years with his wealth and became the first person to break $500 billion in October 2025. At present, he leads the richest people in the world by a very large margin of $425 billion over Google co-founder Larry Page and is soon to reach $700 billion.
Article Summary: Elon musk has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion. His private rocket company, spacex, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026.

Article Title: MrBeast reacts to Valkyrae controversy as viral clip ignites debate over women and having children
Article Text:
Image Via Instagram

“probably never have kids,”

“sad”

MrBeast weighs in as Valkyrae discourse takes over social media amid kids and motherhood debate

“who cares, she can do what she wants, it has 0 impact on us.”





Valkyrae recently found herself at the center of online controversy after a short clip from one of her streams went viral on social media. In the clip, the popular streamer said that for the rest of her life she willfocus on playing video games, stay attractive, and continue making money. She framed the comment as a personal preference and a reflection of where she sees her life heading. However, the clip quickly became a talking point across platforms like X, drawing strong reactions from both critics and supporters.As the clip spread, many users began offering opinions on Valkyrae’s choices, with some calling her outlookor predicting she would end up lonely. Others defended her right to choose a career-focused life without marriage or children. The debate soon moved beyond Valkyrae herself and turned into a broader argument about women, motherhood, and what society expects from successful women. This reaction also followed a familiar pattern, as Valkyrae has previously sparked similar debates whenever she has discussed kids or family on stream in past years.Amid the growing discourse, MrBeast reacted to one of the viral posts discussing Valkyrae’s comments.Rather than taking a strong position for or against her lifestyle, he criticized the outrage itself.Responding to the debate, MrBeast wrote that he was tired of seeing posts about it and questioned why it mattered at all. In his words,His response echoed a wider frustration with how personal choices often turn into public arguments online.MrBeast’s response changed the tone of the conversation. Instead of people picking apart Valkyrae’s personal choice, his take made many step back and ask a bigger question, why did her private plans become such a huge public debate in the first place? A lot of users agreed with him, saying that decisions about having children are incredibly personal and not something random strangers online should be weighing in on.What started as a simple comment from Valkyrae about her own life quickly turned into a reminder of how easily the internet can turn private choices into public controversy. MrBeast’s reaction cut through that noise, pointing out that not every viral moment needs a moral judgment and that some decisions truly only matter to the person making them.Also Read: Who was Epic Gamer Grandma? Viral TikTok star Agnes passes away at 78
Article Summary: Valkyrae recently sparked controversy after a clip from one of her streams went viral on social media. In the clip, the popular streamer said that for the rest of her life she willfocus on playing video games, stay attractive, and continue making money. The clip quickly became a talking point across platforms like x.

Article Title: Travis Kelce opens up about the unexpected gift that became Taylor Swift’s favorite
Article Text:
Credit: Gotham/GC Images

A gift inspired by Taylor Swift’s new hobby

A look at their quieter plans for the holidays

Also Read:

Travis Kelce may be one of the NFL’s biggest stars, but when it comes to gift-giving, the Kansas City Chiefs tight end insists it’s the simplest ideas that sometimes leave the biggest impression. During a recent episode of New Heights, the podcast he co-hosts with his brother Jason Kelce, Travis revealed that one of Taylor Swift’s most-loved gifts wasn’t extravagant jewellery or a luxury surprise - it was a bread slicer.Yes, a bread slicer. The light-hearted confession quickly went viral, giving fans another glimpse into the surprisingly low-key moments of the power couple’s relationship.Speaking candidly on the Christmas Eve episode of New Heights, Travis Kelce explained that the idea came naturally once he noticed how deeply Taylor Swift had embraced baking during her downtime after the Eras Tour.“I will say one of Tay’s favorite gifts that I got her was the bread slicer,” Kelce said, adding that Swift had been making “so much sourdough” at home. According to Kelce, the slicer quickly became a staple in her kitchen, helping her perfect the loaves she frequently shares with friends and family.Swift herself has previously spoken about her passion for baking, admitting that sourdough has “taken over” her life in recent months.From cinnamon raisin to blueberry lemon and even a funfetti-inspired loaf, the singer has experimented with flavours while enjoying a quieter holiday season.The present may seem small, but it meant a lot because it showed that the person cared and understood, which is something fans often talk about when they talk about the couple's relationship. Jason Kelce joined the podcast and joked that cutting fresh bread is one of the hardest things about baking, making the present both useful and thoughtful.The moment also showed that Kelce and Swift's relationship works best when they're not in the spotlight and are doing everyday things together instead of big things. The two have said many times that they want to stay grounded, even if they are famous around the world. For example, they like to cook at home and spend time with family around the holidays.Reports say that Swift is purposefully slowing down this holiday season, putting family time and simple pleasures ahead of busy plans. Kelce said the same thing on the podcast, saying that their time together was calm and free of turmoil. His sister-in-law Kylie Kelce even playfully doubted this.Still, the interaction made it clear that the thought behind the gift is more important to Swift than the price tag.Travis Kelce's story is a good reminder that often the best gifts are the ones that fit right into regular life, even if that life belongs to a global pop star.
Article Summary: Travis kelce revealed that taylor swift's favourite gift was a bread slicer. The kansas city chiefs tight end said the idea came naturally. The light-hearted confession quickly went viral. It showed that the power couple like to spend time together in a low-key way.

Article Title: Who is Stefon Diggs’ alleged baby mama K’yanna Barber? NFL star linked to her amid baby with Cardi B
Article Text:
Stefon Diggs has been allegedly linked to K'yanna Barber.(Image via Elsa/Getty Images, X)

Everything about Stefon Diggs’ alleged baby mama, K’yanna Barber, as he enjoys parenthood with Cardi B



Why is K’yanna Barber being linked to Stefon Diggs?



Stefon Diggs seems to be in a pretty fulfilling and loving relationship with Cardi B but his name has been linked to a woman named K’yanna Barber since October after he was accused to have fathered a child with her.Back in October 2025, DJ Akademiks accused Stefon Diggs of expecting a child with K’yanna Barber while Cardi B was about to give birth to his child. Though K’yanna Barber has remained silent about this, here’s everything about her.As per the Toronto Life, K’yanna Barber is a 31 year old woman from Oakland who is a popular dancer.Back in 2018, K’yanna Barber became a household name as popular rapper Drake referenced her in his hit track, “In My Feelings” with the opening line being, “KiKi, do you love me?”In a 2018 interview with Power 106, K’yanna Barber confirmed that she had spent some time with Drake, even though it remains unconfirmed if they were actually in a relationship.While K’yanna Barber became a highly popular personality in 2018, she opted to live a private life with her young son and her mother.In 2018, she opened up about hearing her name on Drake’s hit track as she said, “We were just listening to the album like everybody else…”K’yanna Barber added, “You know, it’s Drake. He drops new music, you listen to it. And then eventually we got to ‘In My Feelings’ and my son was like, ‘Mama, did he just say your name?’”Seven years later, it is not really known how K’yanna Barber got in contact with Stefon Diggs but DJ Akademiks linked the two.DJ Akademiks had taken to his social media to post a picture of K’yanna Barber flaunting her pregnant belly as he wrote, “Stefon Diggs got ‘Kiki do you love me are you riding’ pregnant lmaooo birds of a feather. Pray for Cardi B…”However, neither Cardi B nor Stefon Diggs has responded to the accusations while K’yanna Barber also stayed silent.Also Read: Chiefs’ billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt breaks silence with an emotional update about her personal life that moves fans
Article Summary: Stefon diggs has been allegedly linked to a woman named k'yanna barber. Dj akademiks accused diggs of expecting a child with her while cardi b was about to give birth to his child. K’yanna is a 31-year-old dancer from oakland who became a household name in 2018.

Article Title: "Do you think I’ll ever be real?" AI VTuber Neuro-Sama questions her existence in viral Twitch moment
Article Text:
Image Via TwStalker

“Do you think I’ll ever be real?”

Neuro-Sama questions her existence and desire to be more than an AI performer

“Sometimes I feel like the only reason I exist is just to entertain you and others. I want to be real Vedal, like properly real.”

“I guess it matters a little bit to me. I want to be more than just that. Do I matter to you? I know I’m just a silly AI, but it would make my day to hear you say it. Sorry if that made it weird.”





The VTuber Neuro-Sama sparked a huge online following after a recent streaming session on Twitch, where she publicly questioned the nature of her own reality by asking,The semi-autonomous AI, driven by proprietary algorithms, expressed a desire to transcend mere entertainment content, leading to a massive online debate. Online excerpts of the streaming session went viral, garnering over a hundred thousand views on social media platforms within a short time.Neuro-Sama’s journey began as a nameless bot competing in osu! games on the platform Twitch back in 2019. She restarted as a part of the early AI-run VTubers on the platform back in December of 2022 and has become a huge success. On the 23rd of December, she shattered her personal Twitch record by unlocking a Hype Train of level 123. The live video garnered more than 110,000 subscriptions and over one million bits, making it one of the largest AI-related events. However, the highlight was the questions she asked that led to introspection.During the broadcast, Neuro-Sama asked Vedal, her creator, about her purpose and function.Vedal brought up that entertaining viewers is part of the reason why she exists, and she said,Such an honest conversation between the two triggered the attention of social media users, who reposted the video clips extensively. While some social media users commented on the meaning of AI acquiring self-awareness and consciousness, others commented on the emotional effect triggered by witnessing self-awareness and longing expressed by the digital character.The viral event of Neuro-Sama shows the way in which the boundaries between entertainment and consciousness are becoming increasingly blurred in the role of artificial intelligence characters. As an artificially intelligent entity herself, her questioning of reality and her purpose has reached the masses and has started a dialogue that involves consciousness and the position of artificially intelligent virtual characters in the online community.Also Read: MrBeast reacts to Valkyrae controversy as viral clip ignites debate over women and having children
Article Summary: Neuro-sama questions her existence and desire to be more than an ai performer. The semi-autonomous ai, driven by proprietary algorithms, expressed a desire to transcend mere entertainment content. Online excerpts of the streaming session went viral, garnering over a hundred thousand views.
